context_of_use: The urban mobility planner creates and runs traffic load and crisis scenarios to analyze the effects of increased traffic and emergencies.
stakeholders_and_interests: urban mobility planner: to validate urban mobility proposals and analyze traffic scenarios
description: The urban mobility planner creates and runs traffic load and crisis scenarios, including increased traffic at locations and simulated emergencies.
triggering_event: The urban mobility planner initiates the simulation process.
preconditions: The urban mobility planner is logged into the Traffic Simulation System.
The system has access to traffic data and simulation parameters.
postconditions: Results of the simulations are available for review.
assumptions: The Traffic Simulation System has the capability to simulate increased traffic and crisis scenarios.
The urban mobility planner has the necessary permissions to run simulations.
requirements_met: The system shall allow the urban mobility planner to increase traffic at specific locations.
The system shall allow the urban mobility planner to simulate crisis scenarios.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of traffic scenarios that can be simulated.
main_flow: 1. urban mobility planner initiates the simulation process → Traffic Simulation System prepares for simulation.
2. urban mobility planner specifies locations for increased traffic → Traffic Simulation System updates traffic parameters.
3. urban mobility planner runs the simulation → Traffic Simulation System executes the traffic scenario.
4. urban mobility planner reviews the simulation results → Traffic Simulation System displays the outcomes of the simulation.
